name: our-grocery-list
description: Simple shared grocery list PWA with one global list

scripts.postinstall: cd api && dotnet restore && (test -z "$CI" && npx playwright install chromium --with-deps || test -n "$COPILOT_AGENT_ACTION" && npx playwright install chromium --with-deps || echo 'Skipping Playwright installation in CI')
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:api
